text: R-Drive Image is a disk disk cloning and system backup computer program. The program is developed and distributed by R-Tools Technology Inc., and intended for home and corporate users. ==File format== R-Drive Image uses a closed file format with the .rdi extension and an open format VMDK.Image Manual, r-tt.com ==Related pages== *Disk cloning *List of disk cloning software == References == == Other websites == *Official website *Reviews: Techradar: R-Drive Image review, PC World: The best Windows backup software, , , , Category:Software Category:Live CD
title: R-Drive Image
